scripts.init:dirs: mkdirp css images js sass/components sass/pages sass/sections src vendor
scripts.init:files: touch README.md index.html js/script.js sass/_layout.scss sass/_mixins.scss sass/_normalize.scss sass/_variables.scss sass/style.scss src/styleguide.html
scripts.build:vendor-copyfiles: cp node_modules/moment/moment.js vendor/moment/ && cp node_modules/pikaday/pikaday.js vendor/pikaday/ && cp node_modules/pikaday/css/pikaday.css vendor/pikaday/css/ && cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/Chart.min.js vendor/chart.js/dist/
scripts.build:docs-createfolders: mkdirp docs docs/js docs/images docs/css docs/vendor/moment docs/vendor/pikaday/css docs/vendor/chart.js/dist/
scripts.build:docs-copyfiles: cp index.html README.md docs && cp js/script.js docs/js && cp css/style.css docs/css && cp images/*.* docs/images && cp node_modules/moment/moment.js docs/vendor/moment && cp node_modules/pikaday/pikaday.js docs/vendor/pikaday && cp node_modules/pikaday/css/pikaday.css docs/vendor/pikaday/css && cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/Chart.min.js docs/vendor/chart.js/dist/
